ref: 408 apakarṣati ʻ draws away ʼ MBh. [Cf. apakr̥ṣṭa -- , Pa. apakaṭṭha -- ʻ drawn away ʼ; Aś. mi. apakaṭha -- ʻ distant ʼ; replaced by *kaḍḍh -- in Pa. apakaḍḍhati, Pk. ōyaḍḍhaï ʻ drags ʼ: √kr̥ṣ]
